column4: Yesterday I learned the basics of how to use ubottu.  As the other person said you go into private session with it and then to find out about its capabilities  ! ubottu | theadmin or whatever subject you're interested in.
I _can't_ start a message with a !, it thinks that's a terminal command to execute and send the output
Oh, now I get it. hmmm...
I moved to Konversation.  I'm very pleased w/ it.
